DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize trial compare same-day cervical preparation use Dilapan-S™ plus buccal misoprostol overnight cervical preparation use Dilapan-S™ D & E 16.0 20.0 week . Primary objective : To compare D & E operative time . We hypothesize same-day Dilapan-S™ plus buccal misoprostol non-inferior overnight Dilapan-S™ respect operative time . Secondary objective : To compare treatment group follow : Pre-operative cervical dilation ; need mechanical dilation ease dilation require ; ability complete D & E without cervical preparation ; ease D & E ; complication ; pain ; side effect ; patient provider satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: Same-day Cervical Preparation Before Dilation Evacuation
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Seeking pregnancy termination 16 0/7 19 6/7 week gestation day enrollment . Eligible pregnancy termination PPNYC Able give inform consent English speaking Active bleeding hemodynamically unstable enrollment Signs chorioamnionitis clinical infection enrollment Signs spontaneous labor cervical insufficiency enrollment Spontaneous intrauterine fetal demise Allergy DilapanS™ misoprostol
